titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. Jones Gregory and James Bowrin, Indictment
CWG5169

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
State of Kentucky
County of Graves } Sct

Graves Equity and Criminal Court
The Commonwealth of Kentucky
Against
Jones Gregory and James Bowrin

The Grand Jury of Graves County in the name and by the authority of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, accuse Jones Gregory & James Bowrin of the crime of Murder, committed as follows, viz said Jones Gregory and James Bowrin on the 5th day of August 1861 in the county aforesaid did feloniously and with malice aforethought conspire with Frank Gregory to kill and murder John Womac, by then and there aiding and abetting, advising and persuading the said Frank Gregory to kill and murder the said John Womac, by shooting him with a gun loaded with powder with leaden shot or bullets, or other hard substance. Against the peace and dignity of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

Information by
Thomas Bailey,
Wm Sherfield,
T. J. Scofield,
Halcomb Jackson.
Thos H. Corbett
Commonwealth attorney first Judicial District

(over)
Bail is fixed in this indictment at Five Hundred dollars for each defendant
J. M. Bigger Judge
A Copy Attest
W A Turner C G C C

The Comlth of Ky
vs } Shooting Murder
Jones Gregory and James Bowrin

A true bill
S. W. Gray Foreman

Filed Aug 8th 1861
process issued Oct 1st 1861
Ervin Anderson C G C C
By S. F. Andersen D C
